entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
